issue.title: Should not be able to add a price on a product with a pre-defined price (free or with profile)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

When responding to an order manually, we can add a price (> 0) to a free product in the "request" view.
Same for a product with a pricing profile and a calculated price.
This should not be possible.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
